about_the_game:
"Rune Ark" is an innovative adventure game that combines immersive match-3 mechanics with a deep, multi-layered storyline. You take on the role of a brave hero who must uncover the truth hidden in the dark corners of the kingdom and confront the looming evil that threatens its existence.

Experience an epic adventure where your strategic thinking and complex puzzle-solving abilities will be put to the test. Interactive dialogues inspired by visual novels allow you to delve deeper into the narrative, influencing the fate of the kingdom and your relationships with encountered characters. Every decision you make has consequences, and your choices can lead to unexpected plot twists.

The combat mechanics based on match-3 elements offer dynamic and satisfying gameplay. Match symbols to execute powerful attacks, unlock special abilities, and uncover hidden fragments of the conspiracy. As you progress through the game, you'll encounter increasingly difficult opponents and complex challenges that make each battle unique.

Explore a vast and meticulously designed world full of hidden secrets, ancient artifacts, and dangerous locations. Meet a diverse cast of characters, from loyal allies to cunning antagonists, each with their own motivations and secrets to discover.
